Detailed Description

Author:
Gruppe 2

Version:
1.0

DESCRIPTION

This program calculates a translation table, which is used during a translation to find the best hypothesis. It expects 3 parameters: a source-doc, a target-doc and the alignment. It outputs the translation-table in this format line by line: <double> relFreq_f <double> relFreq_e # <string> fWord # <string> eWord
